amendment.description: To reauthorize and improve programs related to mental health and substance use disorders.

action.text: Amendment SA 730 proposed by Senator Harkin.

vote.text: Amendment SA 730, under the order of 4/16/13, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 2. Record Vote Number: 105.
